airlock.name: Air Lock
airlock.shortDesc: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.
airlock.desc: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

angerpoint.desc: If this Pokemon, or its substitute, is struck by a critical hit, its Attack is raised by 12 stages.
angerpoint.shortDesc: If this Pokemon or its substitute takes a critical hit, its Attack is raised 12 stages.
angerpoint.name: Anger Point

baddreams.desc: Causes opposing Pokemon to lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn if they are asleep.
baddreams.shortDesc: Causes sleeping foes to lose 1/8 of their max HP at the end of each turn.
baddreams.name: Bad Dreams

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its Fire-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.
blaze.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's Fire-type attacks have 1.5x power.

cloudnine.name: Cloud Nine
cloudnine.shortDesc: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.
cloudnine.desc: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

colorchange.desc: This Pokemon's type changes to match the type of the last move that hit it, unless that type is already one of its types. This effect applies after each hit from a multi-hit move. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.
colorchange.name: Color Change
colorchange.shortDesc: This Pokemon's type changes to the type of a move it's hit by, unless it has the type.

compoundeyes.name: Compound Eyes
compoundeyes.shortDesc: This Pokemon's moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.3.
compoundeyes.desc: This Pokemon's moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.3.

cutecharm.desc: There is a 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will become infatuated if it is of the opposite gender. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.
cutecharm.name: Cute Charm
cutecharm.shortDesc: 30% chance of infatuating Pokemon of the opposite gender if they make contact.

download.name: Download
download.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack or Special Attack is raised by 1 stage based on the weaker combined defensive stat of all opposing Pokemon. Attack is raised if their Defense is lower, and Special Attack is raised if their Special Defense is the same or lower.
download.shortDesc: On switch-in, Attack or Sp. Atk is raised 1 stage based on the foes' weaker Defense.

effectspore.desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned, paralyzed, or fall asleep. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.
effectspore.name: Effect Spore
effectspore.shortDesc: 30% chance of poison/paralysis/sleep on others making contact with this Pokemon.

flamebody.desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be burned. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.
flamebody.name: Flame Body
flamebody.shortDesc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be burned.

flashfire.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Fire-type moves, as long as it is not frozen. The first time it is hit by a Fire-type move, damage from its Fire-type attacks will be multiplied by 1.5 as long as it remains active and has this Ability.
flashfire.name: Flash Fire
flashfire.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Fire attacks do 1.5x damage if hit by one Fire move; Fire immunity.

flowergift.desc: If Sunny Day is active, the Attack and Special Defense of this Pokemon and its allies are multiplied by 1.5.
flowergift.shortDesc: If Sunny Day is active, Attack and Sp. Def of this Pokemon and its allies are 1.5x.
flowergift.name: Flower Gift

forecast.desc: If this Pokemon is a Castform, its type changes to the current weather condition's type, except Sandstorm.
forecast.name: Forecast
forecast.shortDesc: Castform's type changes to the current weather condition's type, except Sandstorm.

forewarn.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted to the move with the highest power, at random, known by an opposing Pokemon. This effect considers OHKO moves to have 150 power, Counter, Mirror Coat, and Metal Burst to have 120 power, and every other attacking move with an unspecified power to have 80 power.
forewarn.name: Forewarn
forewarn.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted to the foes' move with the highest power.

frisk.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon identifies the held item of a random opposing Pokemon.
frisk.name: Frisk
frisk.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon identifies the held item of a random opposing Pokemon.

hustle.name: Hustle
hustle.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is multiplied by 1.5 and the accuracy of its physical attacks is multiplied by 0.8.
hustle.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Attack is 1.5x and accuracy of its physical attacks is 0.8x.

hydration.name: Hydration
hydration.desc: This Pokemon has its non-volatile status condition cured at the end of each turn if Rain Dance is active.
hydration.shortDesc: This Pokemon has its status cured at the end of each turn if Rain Dance is active.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.
insomnia.desc: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

intimidate.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of opposing Pokemon by 1 stage. Pokemon behind a substitute are immune. If U-turn breaks an opposing substitute and this Pokemon switches in as the replacement, the Pokemon that had the substitute is still immune to this Ability.
intimidate.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of opponents by 1 stage.
intimidate.name: Intimidate

leafguard.desc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon cannot become affected by a non-volatile status condition or Yawn, but can use Rest normally.
leafguard.shortDesc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon cannot be statused, but Rest works normally.
leafguard.name: Leaf Guard

lightningrod.desc: If this Pokemon is not the target of a single-target Electric-type move used by another Pokemon, this Pokemon redirects that move to itself.
lightningrod.shortDesc: This Pokemon draws single-target Electric moves to itself.
lightningrod.name: Lightning Rod

liquidooze.desc: This Pokemon damages those draining HP from it for as much as they would heal. This effect does not consider Dream Eater.
liquidooze.name: Liquid Ooze
liquidooze.shortDesc: This Pokemon damages those draining HP from it for as much as they would heal.

magicguard.name: Magic Guard
magicguard.desc: This Pokemon can only be damaged by direct attacks. Curse and Substitute on use, Belly Drum, Pain Split, Struggle recoil, and confusion damage are considered direct damage. This Pokemon cannot be prevented from moving because of paralysis, and is unaffected by Toxic Spikes on switch-in.
magicguard.shortDesc: This Pokemon can only be damaged by direct attacks, and can't be fully paralyzed.

minus.name: Minus
minus.desc: If an active ally has the Plus Ability, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5.
minus.shortDesc: If an active ally has the Plus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.

naturalcure.name: Natural Cure
naturalcure.shortDesc: This Pokemon has its non-volatile status condition cured when it switches out.
naturalcure.desc: This Pokemon has its non-volatile status condition cured when it switches out.

normalize.desc: This Pokemon's moves are changed to be Normal type. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, except Struggle.
normalize.shortDesc: This Pokemon's moves are changed to be Normal type.
normalize.name: Normalize

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its Grass-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.
overgrow.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's Grass-type attacks have 1.5x power.

plus.name: Plus
plus.desc: If an active ally has the Minus Ability, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5.
plus.shortDesc: If an active ally has the Minus Ability, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.

poisonpoint.desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.
poisonpoint.name: Poison Point
poisonpoint.shortDesc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned.

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.desc: If this Pokemon is the target of another Pokemon's move, that move loses one additional PP.
pressure.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is the target of a move, that move loses one additional PP.

roughskin.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.
roughskin.name: Rough Skin
roughskin.shortDesc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their max HP.

sandveil.name: Sand Veil
sandveil.desc: If Sandstorm is active, the accuracy of moves used against this Pokemon is multiplied by 0.8. This Pokemon takes no damage from Sandstorm.
sandveil.shortDesc: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x; immunity to Sandstorm.

serenegrace.desc: This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.
serenegrace.name: Serene Grace
serenegrace.shortDesc: This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.

shedskin.name: Shed Skin
shedskin.desc: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its non-volatile status condition cured at the end of each turn.
shedskin.shortDesc: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its status cured at the end of each turn.

simple.name: Simple
simple.desc: This Pokemon's stat stages are considered doubled during stat calculations. A stat stage cannot be considered more than 6 or less than -6.
simple.shortDesc: This Pokemon's stat stages are considered doubled during stat calculations.

snowcloak.desc: If Hail is active, the accuracy of moves used against this Pokemon is multiplied by 0.8. This Pokemon takes no damage from Hail.
snowcloak.shortDesc: If Hail is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x; immunity to Hail.
snowcloak.name: Snow Cloak

speedboost.name: Speed Boost
speedboost.desc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised by 1 stage at the end of each full turn it has been on the field.
speedboost.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage at the end of each full turn on the field.

static.desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed. This effect does not happen if this Pokemon did not lose HP from the attack.
static.name: Static
static.shortDesc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed.

stickyhold.desc: This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's attack, even if the attack knocks out this Pokemon. A Sticky Barb will be transferred to other Pokemon regardless of this Ability.
stickyhold.name: Sticky Hold
stickyhold.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's Ability or attack.

stormdrain.desc: If this Pokemon is not the target of a single-target Water-type move used by another Pokemon, this Pokemon redirects that move to itself.
stormdrain.shortDesc: This Pokemon draws single-target Water moves to itself.
stormdrain.name: Storm Drain

sturdy.desc: OHKO moves fail when used against this Pokemon.
sturdy.shortDesc: OHKO moves fail when used against this Pokemon.
sturdy.name: Sturdy

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its Bug-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.
swarm.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's Bug-type attacks have 1.5x power.

synchronize.desc: If another Pokemon burns, paralyzes, or poisons this Pokemon, that Pokemon receives the same non-volatile status condition. If another Pokemon badly poisons this Pokemon, that Pokemon becomes poisoned.
synchronize.name: Synchronize
synchronize.shortDesc: If another Pokemon burns/poisons/paralyzes this Pokemon, it also gets that status.

tangledfeet.name: Tangled Feet
tangledfeet.shortDesc: This Pokemon's evasiveness is doubled as long as it is confused.
tangledfeet.desc: This Pokemon's evasiveness is doubled as long as it is confused.

thickfat.name: Thick Fat
thickfat.desc: The power of Fire- and Ice-type attacks against this Pokemon is halved.
thickfat.shortDesc: The power of Fire- and Ice-type attacks against this Pokemon is halved.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its Water-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.
torrent.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's Water-type attacks have 1.5x power.

trace.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon copies a random opposing Pokemon's Ability. Abilities that cannot be copied are Forecast, Multitype, and Trace. If no opposing Pokemon has an Ability that can be copied, this Ability will activate as soon as one does.
trace.name: Trace
trace.shortDesc: On switch-in, or when it can, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent foe's Ability.

unburden.name: Unburden
unburden.desc: If this Pokemon loses its held item for any reason, its Speed is doubled as long as it remains active, has this Ability, and is not holding an item.
unburden.shortDesc: Speed is doubled on held item loss; boost is lost if it switches, gets new item/Ability.

vitalspirit.name: Vital Spirit
vitalspirit.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.
vitalspirit.desc: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

wonderguard.shortDesc: This Pokemon is only damaged by Fire Fang, supereffective moves, indirect damage.
wonderguard.name: Wonder Guard
wonderguard.desc: This Pokemon is only damaged by Fire Fang, supereffective moves, indirect damage.

anticipation.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted if any opposing Pokemon has an attack that is super effective against this Pokemon, or an OHKO move that this Pokemon is not immune to and if its level is less than or equal to the opposing Pokemon's level. This effect does not consider Counter, Dragon Rage, Metal Burst, Mirror Coat, Night Shade, Psywave, or Seismic Toss as attacking moves, and Hidden Power, Judgment, Natural Gift, and Weather Ball are considered Normal-type moves. This effect considers any changes to the effectiveness of attacks against this Pokemon due to the effects of Gravity or the Normalize or Scrappy Abilities.
anticipation.name: Anticipation
anticipation.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon shudders if any foe has a supereffective or OHKO move.

arenatrap.desc: Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are airborne or holding a Shed Shell.
arenatrap.name: Arena Trap
arenatrap.shortDesc: Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out unless they are airborne.

levitate.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and the Arena Trap Ability. The effects of Gravity, Ingrain, and Iron Ball nullify the immunity.
levitate.shortDesc: This Pokemon is immune to Ground; Gravity/Ingrain/Iron Ball nullify it.
levitate.name: Levitate

magnetpull.desc: Prevents opposing Steel-type Pokemon from choosing to switch out, unless they are holding a Shed Shell.
magnetpull.shortDesc: Prevents opposing Steel-type Pokemon from choosing to switch out.
magnetpull.name: Magnet Pull

moldbreaker.desc: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore certain Abilities of other Pokemon. The Abilities that can be negated are Battle Armor, Clear Body, Damp, Dry Skin, Filter, Flash Fire, Flower Gift, Heatproof, Hyper Cutter, Immunity, Inner Focus, Insomnia, Keen Eye, Leaf Guard, Levitate, Lightning Rod, Limber, Magma Armor, Marvel Scale, Motor Drive, Oblivious, Own Tempo, Sand Veil, Shell Armor, Shield Dust, Simple, Snow Cloak, Solid Rock, Soundproof, Sticky Hold, Storm Drain, Sturdy, Suction Cups, Tangled Feet, Thick Fat, Unaware, Vital Spirit, Volt Absorb, Water Absorb, Water Veil, White Smoke, and Wonder Guard. This affects every other Pokemon on the field, whether or not it is a target of this Pokemon's move. The Attack modifier from an ally's Flower Gift Ability is not negated.
moldbreaker.name: Mold Breaker
moldbreaker.shortDesc: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

multitype.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is an Arceus, its type changes to match its held Plate. This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's attack.
multitype.name: Multitype
multitype.desc: If this Pokemon is an Arceus, its type changes to match its held Plate. This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's attack.

shadowtag.desc: Prevents opposing Pokemon from choosing to switch out, unless they are holding a Shed Shell or also have this Ability.
shadowtag.shortDesc: Prevents foes from choosing to switch unless they also have this Ability.
shadowtag.name: Shadow Tag

skilllink.desc: This Pokemon's multi-hit attacks always hit the maximum number of times. Does not affect Triple Kick.
skilllink.name: Skill Link
skilllink.shortDesc: This Pokemon's multi-hit attacks always hit the maximum number of times.

soundproof.shortDesc: This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, including Heal Bell.
soundproof.name: Soundproof
soundproof.desc: This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, including Heal Bell.

technician.desc: This Pokemon's moves of 60 power or less have their power multiplied by 1.5, except Struggle. This effect comes after a move's effect changes its own power, as well as the effects of Charge and Helping Hand.
technician.shortDesc: This Pokemon's moves of 60 power or less have 1.5x power, except Struggle.
technician.name: Technician

keeneye.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's accuracy stat stage.
keeneye.shortDesc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's accuracy stat stage.
keeneye.name: Keen Eye

oblivious.desc: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated. Gaining this Ability while infatuated cures it.
oblivious.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated. Gaining this Ability while infatuated cures it.
oblivious.name: Oblivious

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.desc: If this Pokemon is knocked out with a contact move, that move's user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down. If any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability, this effect is prevented.
aftermath.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is KOed with a contact move, that move's user loses 1/4 its max HP.

damp.desc: While this Pokemon is active, Explosion, Self-Destruct, and the Aftermath Ability are prevented from having an effect.
damp.shortDesc: Prevents Explosion/Self-Destruct/Aftermath while this Pokemon is active.
damp.name: Damp

quickfeet.desc: If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Speed is multiplied by 1.5. This Pokemon ignores the paralysis effect of quartering Speed.
quickfeet.name: Quick Feet
quickfeet.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is statused, its Speed is 1.5x; ignores Speed drop from paralysis.

slowstart.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.
slowstart.name: Slow Start
slowstart.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.

innerfocus.desc: This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch.
innerfocus.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch.
innerfocus.name: Inner Focus

owntempo.desc: This Pokemon cannot be confused. Gaining this Ability while confused cures it.
owntempo.name: Own Tempo

scrappy.desc: This Pokemon can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
scrappy.shortDesc: This Pokemon can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
scrappy.name: Scrappy

chlorophyll.desc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.shortDesc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

dryskin.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by a Water-type move. The power of Fire-type moves is multiplied by 1.25 when used on this Pokemon. At the end of each turn, this Pokemon restores 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, if the weather is Rain Dance, and loses 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, if the weather is Sunny Day.
dryskin.name: Dry Skin
dryskin.shortDesc: This Pokemon is healed 1/4 by Water, 1/8 by Rain; is hurt 1.25x by Fire, 1/8 by Sun.

raindish.desc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon restores 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn.
raindish.name: Rain Dish
raindish.shortDesc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn.

solarpower.desc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5 and it loses 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn.
solarpower.name: Solar Power
solarpower.shortDesc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x; loses 1/8 max HP per turn.

swiftswim.desc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.
swiftswim.name: Swift Swim
swiftswim.shortDesc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.desc: This Pokemon's moves that match one of its types have a same-type attack bonus (STAB) of 2 instead of 1.5.
adaptability.shortDesc: This Pokemon's same-type attack bonus (STAB) is 2 instead of 1.5.

battlearmor.name: Battle Armor
battlearmor.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.
battlearmor.desc: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

clearbody.name: Clear Body
clearbody.shortDesc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.
clearbody.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Rain Dance.
drizzle.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Rain Dance.

drought.name: Drought
drought.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sunny Day.
drought.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sunny Day.

earlybird.name: Early Bird
earlybird.shortDesc: This Pokemon's sleep counter drops by 2 instead of 1.
earlybird.desc: This Pokemon's sleep counter drops by 2 instead of 1.

filter.name: Filter
filter.shortDesc: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.
filter.desc: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.

gluttony.name: Gluttony
gluttony.desc: When this Pokemon is holding a Berry that usually activates with 1/4 or less of its maximum HP, it is eaten at 1/2 or less of its maximum HP instead.
gluttony.shortDesc: This Pokemon eats Berries at 1/2 max HP or less instead of their usual 1/4 max HP.

guts.name: Guts
guts.desc: If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Attack is multiplied by 1.5. This Pokemon's physical attacks ignore the burn effect of halving damage.
guts.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is statused, its Attack is 1.5x; ignores burn halving physical damage.

heatproof.desc: The power of Fire-type attacks against this Pokemon is halved. This Pokemon takes half of the usual burn damage, rounded down.
heatproof.shortDesc: The power of Fire-type attacks against this Pokemon is halved; burn damage halved.
heatproof.name: Heatproof

hypercutter.name: Hyper Cutter
hypercutter.shortDesc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Attack stat stage.
hypercutter.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Attack stat stage.

icebody.desc: If Hail is active, this Pokemon restores 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. This Pokemon takes no damage from Hail.
icebody.shortDesc: If Hail is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn; immunity to Hail.
icebody.name: Ice Body

immunity.name: Immunity
immunity.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be poisoned. Gaining this Ability while poisoned cures it.
immunity.desc: This Pokemon cannot be poisoned. Gaining this Ability while poisoned cures it.

ironfist.name: Iron Fist
ironfist.desc: This Pokemon's punch-based attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2.
ironfist.shortDesc: This Pokemon's punch-based attacks have 1.2x power. Sucker Punch is not boosted.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.desc: This Pokemon's held item has no effect. This Pokemon cannot use Fling successfully. Macho Brace, Power Anklet, Power Band, Power Belt, Power Bracer, Power Lens, and Power Weight still have their effects.
klutz.shortDesc: This Pokemon's held item has no effect, except Macho Brace. Fling cannot be used.

limber.name: Limber
limber.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be paralyzed. Gaining this Ability while paralyzed cures it.
limber.desc: This Pokemon cannot be paralyzed. Gaining this Ability while paralyzed cures it.

magmaarmor.name: Magma Armor
magmaarmor.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be frozen. Gaining this Ability while frozen cures it.
magmaarmor.desc: This Pokemon cannot be frozen. Gaining this Ability while frozen cures it.

marvelscale.name: Marvel Scale
marvelscale.shortDesc: If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Defense is multiplied by 1.5.
marvelscale.desc: If this Pokemon has a non-volatile status condition, its Defense is multiplied by 1.5.

motordrive.name: Motor Drive
motordrive.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Electric-type moves and raises its Speed by 1 stage when hit by an Electric-type move.
motordrive.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage if hit by an Electric move; Electric immunity.

noguard.name: No Guard
noguard.shortDesc: Every move used by or against this Pokemon will always hit.
noguard.desc: Every move used by or against this Pokemon will always hit.

poisonheal.name: Poison Heal
poisonheal.desc: If this Pokemon is poisoned, it restores 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn instead of losing HP.
poisonheal.shortDesc: This Pokemon is healed by 1/8 of its max HP each turn when poisoned; no HP loss.

reckless.name: Reckless
reckless.desc: This Pokemon's attacks with recoil or crash damage have their power multiplied by 1.2. Does not affect Struggle.
reckless.shortDesc: This Pokemon's attacks with recoil or crash damage have 1.2x power; not Struggle.

rivalry.name: Rivalry
rivalry.desc: This Pokemon's attacks have their power multiplied by 1.25 against targets of the same gender or multiplied by 0.75 against targets of the opposite gender. There is no modifier if either this Pokemon or the target is genderless.
rivalry.shortDesc: This Pokemon's attacks do 1.25x on same gender targets; 0.75x on opposite gender.

rockhead.name: Rock Head
rockhead.desc: This Pokemon does not take recoil damage, except Struggle. Does not affect Life Orb damage or crash damage.
rockhead.shortDesc: This Pokemon does not take recoil damage besides Struggle/Life Orb/crash damage.

sandstream.name: Sand Stream
sandstream.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sandstorm.
sandstream.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sandstorm.

shellarmor.name: Shell Armor
shellarmor.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.
shellarmor.desc: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

shielddust.name: Shield Dust
shielddust.shortDesc: This Pokemon is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.
shielddust.desc: This Pokemon is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.shortDesc: If this Pokemon strikes with a critical hit, the damage is multiplied by 1.5.
sniper.desc: If this Pokemon strikes with a critical hit, the damage is multiplied by 1.5.

snowwarning.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Hail.
snowwarning.name: Snow Warning
snowwarning.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Hail.

solidrock.name: Solid Rock
solidrock.shortDesc: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.
solidrock.desc: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.

stall.name: Stall
stall.shortDesc: This Pokemon moves last among Pokemon using the same or greater priority moves.
stall.desc: This Pokemon moves last among Pokemon using the same or greater priority moves.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.shortDesc: If this Pokemon flinches, its Speed is raised by 1 stage.
steadfast.desc: If this Pokemon flinches, its Speed is raised by 1 stage.

suctioncups.name: Suction Cups
suctioncups.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be forced to switch out by another Pokemon's attack or item.
suctioncups.desc: This Pokemon cannot be forced to switch out by another Pokemon's attack or item.

superluck.name: Super Luck
superluck.shortDesc: This Pokemon's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.
superluck.desc: This Pokemon's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.

tintedlens.name: Tinted Lens
tintedlens.shortDesc: This Pokemon's attacks that are not very effective on a target deal double damage.
tintedlens.desc: This Pokemon's attacks that are not very effective on a target deal double damage.

truant.name: Truant
truant.shortDesc: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.
truant.desc: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.desc: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's Attack, Special Attack, and accuracy stat stages when taking damage, and ignores other Pokemon's Defense, Special Defense, and evasiveness stat stages when dealing damage.
unaware.shortDesc: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's stat stages when taking or doing damage.

voltabsorb.name: Volt Absorb
voltabsorb.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Electric-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by an Electric-type move.
voltabsorb.shortDesc: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Electric moves; Electric immunity.

waterabsorb.name: Water Absorb
waterabsorb.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by a Water-type move.
waterabsorb.shortDesc: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Water moves; Water immunity.

waterveil.name: Water Veil
waterveil.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.
waterveil.desc: This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.

whitesmoke.name: White Smoke
whitesmoke.shortDesc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.
whitesmoke.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

mountaineer.name: Mountaineer
mountaineer.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon avoids all Rock-type attacks and Stealth Rock.
mountaineer.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon avoids all Rock-type attacks and Stealth Rock.

rebound.name: Rebound
rebound.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon blocks certain status moves and instead uses the move against the original user.
rebound.shortDesc: On switch-in, blocks certain status moves and bounces them back to the user.

persistent.name: Persistent
persistent.desc: The duration of Gravity, Heal Block, Magic Room, Safeguard, Tailwind, Trick Room, and Wonder Room is increased by 2 turns if the effect is started by this Pokemon.
persistent.shortDesc: When used, Gravity/Heal Block/Safeguard/Tailwind/Room effects last 2 more turns.
